ygData.subject: shadowknight quest
ygData.msgSnippet: twice have i fought groflah. twice has he very nearly killed me, and twice has his corpse disappeared immedeately upon his death, leaving me with no xp and a
ygData.messageBody:
twice have i fought groflah. twice has he very nearly killed me, and
twice has his corpse disappeared immedeately upon his death, leaving me
with no xp and a bunch of nasty faction hits. this is just yet ANOTHER
broken SK quest in freeport, and quite frankly i've given up trying to
get the GMs to fix them.. i've been ragging on them since day one that
these things are broken, and i've seen little effort put into repairing
them. also broken is the quest where lady shae supposedly drops a list
of some sort when you kill her. i accept that the thing may be rare, but
after 50+ kills, i'd assume it would have appeared by now. hell, even
the guild tunic quest in freeport is broken! is anybody else annoyed by
this? after all, i level so damn slow that i have little else to do but
try to do quests :) (i've been playing since the release. my main
character is now just barely lvl 23. i get depressed seeing all these
lvl 30s and 40s running around...)

Beld Demonblade
Fennin Ro
